author: wouf
body:
#### PR description:

- Update Hydjet 1.9 configs to the CELLO tune:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/1529160/contributions/6433388/attachments/3036481/5362656/CELLO_tune.pdf
- Update HI-related GEN configs to multi-thread ExternalGeneratorFilter
- Update nuclear radius for Pb, O, Xe, Ne

#### backport to
CMSSW_15_0_X
CMSSW_14_1_X
title: 2025 update of heavy-ion generator configurations
